data.name: Suez Canal Simulator: TI Oceania Supertanker DLC
data.detailed_description:
Own one of the largest ships in the world.. The legendary TI Oceania, available now for Suez Canal Simulator!

A LITTLE HISTORY

The TI class of supertankers were the first ULCCs (ultra-large crude carriers) to be built in 25 years. Comprised of the TI Africa, TI Asia, TI Europe and TI Oceania, the ships are some of the largest ever built. By displacement, deadweight tonnage (≈ cargo mass), and gross tonnage (a formula value based on internal volume, not mass), the TI class ships are smaller only than Pioneering Spirit specialty crane vessel.

All four oil tankers were constructed for shipping company Hellespont Group by Daewoo Shipbuilding & Marine Engineering in Okpo, South Korea, entering service between March 2002 and April 2003. The ships were originally named Hellespont Alhambra, Hellespont Fairfax, Hellespont Metropolis and Hellespont Tara.

In 2004, Belgian shipowner Euronav NV and partners purchased all four ships. Hellespont Fairfax, Hellespont Tara, Hellespont Alhambra and Hellespont Metropolis were renamed TI Oceania, TI Europe, TI Asia and TI Africa respectively.

SHIP INFORMATION

Type Ultra Large Crude Carrier

Length 380 m (1,246 ft 9 in) o/a
Beam 68 m (223 ft 1 in)
Draught 24.5 m (80 ft 5 in)
Tonnage 234,006 GT; 162,477 NT; 441,893 DWT
Displacement 67,591 tonnes (66,524 long tons) light
509,484 tonnes (501,437 long tons) full load
Speed 16.5 knots (30.6 km/h; 19.0 mph) (laden)
Capacity 3,166,353 barrels (503,409,900 L)

TI OCEANIA IS AVAILABLE NOW

One of the most legendary supertankers in the world can be yours today. In this package you get the 380 meter long TI Oceania Supertanker as well as two new Journeys for Suez Canal Simulator where you will transit the full length of the canal in both directions, as well as free lifetime updates and more TI Oceania journeys to come.

Get underway today! Add the TI Oceania DLC for Suez Canal to you Steam Library now!

*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11 (all versions)
  • Processor: Quad-core 2.6 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX760 with 2GB (or equivalent)
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Downloads from Steam servers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11 (all versions)
  • Processor: Quad-core 3.0 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX1080 with 8GB (or equivalent)
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Downloads from Steam servers
